title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet launches with enhanced reasoning
summary: Anthropic announces Claude 3.5 Sonnet, boosting reasoning, coding, and tool use in its flagship AI assistant.

title: Gen-3 Alpha now supports camera motion presets
summary: Runway announces on X that Gen-3 Alpha gains new camera motion presets for creators to storyboard shots quickly.

title: Runway debuts Gen-3 Alpha for text-to-video
summary: Runway launches Gen-3 Alpha, a new multimodal video generation model with finer control and cinematic quality.

title: Hugging Face releases Idefics2 multimodal foundation model
summary: Hugging Face launches Idefics2, advancing multimodal understanding with improved vision-language reasoning.

title: IBM expands watsonx Granite models
summary: IBM launches new Granite code and instruction models for watsonx, adding multilingual and domain-specific capabilities.

title: Introducing GPT-4o
summary: OpenAI launches GPT-4o, a multimodal flagship model delivering real-time text, image, and audio capabilities.

title: Microsoft introduces Phi-3 family of small language models
summary: Microsoft Research debuts Phi-3-mini, Phi-3-small, and Phi-3-medium models optimized for on-device and enterprise AI.

title: Meta releases Llama 3
summary: Meta open-sources Llama 3 models with improved performance, multilingual support, and updated safety tooling.

title: Introducing Command R+ for enterprise AI
summary: Cohere releases Command R+, a retrieval-augmented language model tailored for complex enterprise workflows and multilingual tasks.

title: Stable Diffusion 3 arrives with improved image generation
summary: Stability AI introduces Stable Diffusion 3, delivering stronger text rendering, photorealism, and safety controls.
